title: Bug 50793 - Invalid DispatchType in ServletRequestListener on async dispatch
description: When a ServletRequestListener is invoked after a call to AsyncContext.dispatch(), the DispatcherType returned from the ServletRequest is incorrect, showing REQUEST instead of ASYNC.
OB: The DispatcherType returned from the ServletRequest after invoking ServletRequestListener post AsyncContext.dispatch() is reported as REQUEST instead of the expected ASYNC.
EB: The expected behavior is that after calling AsyncContext.dispatch(), the DispatcherType returned from the ServletRequest when the ServletRequestListener is invoked should correctly reflect ASYNC.
SR:
1. Set up a ServletRequestListener in a servlet-based application.
2. Trigger an AsyncContext.dispatch() within the servlet.
3. Observe the DispatcherType returned from the ServletRequest when the ServletRequestListener is invoked. It should reflect REQUEST, but it is incorrectly displaying ASYNC.
